description:
Sunny, studio apartments becoming available in mid-September!!! Apartments feature a kitchenette w/ microwave and upgraded bath, large windows and 9 ft. ceilings. Ask about our NO SECURITY DEPOSIT program!! Cats are welcome (add'l fee)! All apartments are rented unfurnished.
Chancellor Apartments is a convenient high rise apartment community in an amazing location in Center City. We are close to most major schools and universities, public transportation, historical attractions, shopping, restaurants and theaters. Center City at its best!!
Rent includes: heat, hot/cold water, 24-hour front desk attendant, free bike storage room, package acceptance service, 24-hour emergency maintenance service, on-site smart card laundry plus card access system and BuildingLink resident services portal access for all residents.
The Chancellor boasts several different studio and one bedroom floor plans. Apartments feature high ceilings, large bright windows, ceiling fans in most units, hardwood floors and breathtaking views of the Philadelphia skyline and Delaware River. Many apartments have large walk-in closets, too!
We have partnered with Optimal Sport Health Club to offer a generous discounted gym membership (we pay your initiation fee!). There are several off street parking lots and garages in the area, too!

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

description: FIRST FLOOR END UNIT: MOVE IN READY, ONE BEDROOM, ONE BATH UNIT WITH PATIO IN TRIMBLE RUN! title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.

title: Renovated 1 BR Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 13, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* One bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 3rd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 315 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

description:

Move into your new home as early as September 8, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, or Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a selection of scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday form 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Renovated Town House. Brand New Kitchen and Bath. Pet Friendly
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023.

title: Gorgeous mother-in-law suite with New Kitchen, balcony
description:
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm
